channel.title: D claws and login packet
channel.description: now my d claws problem does anybody got the code public void specdamg and public void specnpcdamg for a delta 317 base anybody i need these commands to make d claws hit 4 times it shows 4 numbers but 3 are 0s and 1 is a number and all my specs that hit 2 liek d hally and d bow the 2nd number of spec dont hit i know it has to do with that can anybody supply me with this code. also how do i change it so only people can login with my client i know u have to change the login packet but what do i change of it im confused

item.title: D claws and login packet
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

does anybody got a public void specdamg and public void specnpcdamg code thats for 317 deltascape base that makes d claws hit 4 numbers atm mine hit 4 numbers 3 are 0s ones a actual number i k that its these commands and not the d claw code can anybody give me the code plox and also how do i make it so your client is the only client allowed to access your server cause the tutorials dont work for me.

Read full topic

item.title: D claws and login packet
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[code]
public int dclaws = 0;

public void dclawed2() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed2);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}
public void dclawed() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}
public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 2068);
dclaws = 3;
getHit(65);
usingSpecial = true;
} [/code]

You figure out where to put it all.

Read full topic
